reviewText: Complete rip off! -- "The Missing" isn't an original dvd. Someone filmed it with a handycam! The picture jerks around and is so distracting you know it's a fake. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY! -- Also, "The Three Burials..." -- is a terrible movie! It's been on my list 'to see' for a long time, because I love Tommy Lee Jones, but this was just awful! It's the western version of "Weekend at Bernie's". Disappointing combo overall... I do hope the 'powers that be' release "The Missing" on Blu-ray. It is a truly wonderful western.
Husband loved. Stayed at ranch in Texas recently where one of these movies was filmed, so it made it really special. They had the cross from the Three Burials....on the wall. Very cool.
Tommy Lee Jones at his best!
Great  movies  fast delivery  what's  not to like.
